column5: Canadian Tire at Bayview and Shepard has Mustang Floater bibs at 52% off. They are now $109.00 aND REALLY NICE
that is a good deal, thanks for posting.
btw -- for floatation purposes I wouldn't wear these things without a floater coat or a lifejacket.  Would hate to be in the water with the bottom part of my body trying to rise above the top part.
You are right Cram. Have to have the jacket as well. I hope that is on sale as well. Cheers.
I called and they are all out, apparently a discontinued item and now gone.
I raz my Dutch father-in-law about his wooden shoes all the time... built in floation device for when they fell in the canal ! lol
